Liz Gunn fails in bid to dodge conviction for Auckland Airport assault https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/liz-gunn-fails-in-bid-to-dodge-conviction-for-auckland-airport-assault/BFCPKX5CWBABFDTWQ6QSK7UYQU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/liz-gunn-fails-in-bid-to-dodge-conviction-for-auckland-airport-assault/BFCPKX5CWBABFDTWQ6QSK7UYQU/ George BlockThe former TVNZ host has failed in her attempt to avoid an assault conviction. Photo / George Block

Committee calls for submissions on Treaty Principles Bill, swearing banned https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/committee-calls-for-submissions-on-treaty-principles-bill-swearing-banned/ROP454P5BVBK3NTUKD2EPQZIBE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/committee-calls-for-submissions-on-treaty-principles-bill-swearing-banned/ROP454P5BVBK3NTUKD2EPQZIBE/ Thomas CoughlanParliament's justice committee says it will run a full 6-month process. Australian snack giant Arnott’s acquires Mother Earth, Flemings https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/companies/retail/australian-snack-giant-arnotts-acquires-mother-earth-flemings/USZRI2OWYJEY3AGCF64CDTWPDQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/companies/retail/australian-snack-giant-arnotts-acquires-mother-earth-flemings/USZRI2OWYJEY3AGCF64CDTWPDQ/ Tom RaynelMother Earth, Flemings and Value Pack (VP) join the almost 160-year-old Australian group. Photo / arnott's.com
Sweden, Finland urge residents to be ready for war https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/sweden-finland-urge-residents-to-be-ready-for-war/WOR2QPOVIZGXPGASPOSJPITODY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/sweden-finland-urge-residents-to-be-ready-for-war/WOR2QPOVIZGXPGASPOSJPITODY/ Johannes Ledel and Pia OhlinWith the conflict in Ukraine continuing, Sweden and Finland are getting ready for war. Mon, 18 Nov 2024 22:35:27 +0000 Sweden today began sending some five million pamphlets to residents urging them to prepare for the possibility of war, as neighbouring Finland launched a new preparedness website. Photo / AFP

Stolen caravan and wrench-throwing in Coromandel results in two arrests https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/stolen-caravan-and-wrench- throwing-in-coromandel-results-in-two-arrests/ITANY4PVVBCRBLUISBRMWTN53A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/stolen-caravan-and-wrench- throwing-in-coromandel-results-in-two-arrests/ITANY4PVVBCRBLUISBRMWTN53A/ A hammer was thrown at police during pursuit and a wrench hit two members of the public. Mon, 18 Nov 2024 21:13:26 +0000 A vehicle towing a stolen caravan has taken police on “reckless” chase around the Coromandel resulting in injuries to members of the public. Photo / 123rf
